resources.string:
Oh, I didn't mean to disturb you by "popping" in soooo sooooon. Hiiiiiii! 
 
 Enjoy the 2 minutes and 45 excrutiating seconds of this. Unless of course, you like ear sores. 
 
 OR... You can just touch me to get the music to stop **wink wink**
Tap anywhere on the screen to view a message from our sponsor!
